member.name: T:Microsoft.International.Windows.Forms.YomiganaTextBox

member.summary: Preferred Conversion for yomigana.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.Windows.Forms.PreferredConversion.None
member.summary: No conversion. Respects the user entered kana type (do not convert).

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.Windows.Forms.PreferredConversion.ToHiragana
member.summary: ToHiragana: Covnert Katakana and Halfwidth Katakana to Hiragana. Other characters will pass through.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.Windows.Forms.PreferredConversion.ToKatakana
member.summary: ToKatakana: Convert Hiragana and Halfwidth Katakana to Katakana. Other characters will pass through.

member.name: F:Microsoft.International.Windows.Forms.PreferredConversion.ToHalfwidthKatakana
member.summary: ToHalfwidthKatakana: Convert Hiragana and Katakana to Halfwidth Katakana. Other char will pass through.
